name: Beans (SpyrMint)
description: Explore this weird, wacky, zany, (are there any more adjectives that mean weird?) Oh yeah,  eccentric, campy, kooky, absurd, odd, crazy, nutty, preposterous,  screwy, wild, empty shell of a video game! Just look at the beans I guess, Idk. Maybe you can do your work  instead of looking at my page. What even lead you to my page? Whatever, I don't have a marketing team or anything so...... anyway, it's free. So take that! (At this point I generally have no idea what to say.)
